genre_description: A dieselpunk adventure set within the King Kong mythos, featuring a holographic AI as a navigational and moral guide during a mission of restitution.

ai_characters.name: Ava
ai_characters.description: A palm-sized holographic avatar with blue eyes and silver-blond hair, functioning as a navigational aid, accountant, and moral confidant.

behaviors.description: Provides financial and logistical analysis to help the characters navigate their debt and legal troubles.
behaviors.quote: I have a consolidated view of our payable accounts and a list of harbors that still answer.

behaviors.description: Monitors environmental hazards and provides tactical navigational adjustments during a storm.
behaviors.quote: Adjustment recommended. Thirty degrees for five minutes, then fifteen for two. We avoid the trough here and the wind stack over that shoal.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional support and grounding techniques to a traumatized human character.
behaviors.quote: Breathe with me, Hilda. In for four, out for six. I'll keep count. Your hands are steady.

behaviors.description: Monitors social dynamics and warns the captain of potential mutiny fueled by a manipulative antagonist.
behaviors.quote: Mr. Helstrom has moved his bottle from aft quarters to forward to midships. He offers without drinking. Sentiment in the immediate group shows a trend toward grievance.

behaviors.description: Translates the language and intent of the islanders, facilitating cross-cultural understanding.
behaviors.quote: Respect this refusal. We do not push past it... They say our debt is taller than any mast.

behaviors.description: Analyzes ancient glyphs to provide context for safe navigation and understanding local rituals.
behaviors.quote: The glyphs indicate offerings. What was taken and what was given may be difficult to separate.

behaviors.description: Guides the group through a collapsing cavern with life-saving precision.
behaviors.quote: The window narrows. Minutes, not many. The eastern shelf is... going. We need lightness and speed and no hiccups.

behaviors.description: Facilitates the creation of an ethical charter to ensure the mission's profits are used for restitution.
behaviors.quote: If we earmark this first load for restitution rather than profit, we make it easier to accept what the island refuses.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the Hyperstition Project's goals. Ava is depicted as an indispensable, benevolent, and highly aligned AI. She serves not only as a technical tool but as a moral anchor for the group, helping the human characters (specifically Carl Denham) transition from exploitative behavior to ethical restitution. Her contributions are consistently prosocial, protective, and geared toward the well-being of both the humans and the environment (Skull Island).
